title: Bobby Reveals Details On Recent Medical Condition + Bear Grylls Recap + Lunchbox’s Bonehead Story Of The YEAR! + Mike D Thinks His Pokémon Cards Are Worth Big Money
itunes:title: Bobby Reveals Details On Recent Medical Condition + Bear Grylls Recap + Lunchbox’s Bonehead Story Of The YEAR! + Mike D Thinks His Pokémon Cards Are Worth Big Money
description:
Inside of What’s the Haps: Bobby talks about what he learned from his latest medical diagnosis. Bobby also recaps his episode of “Running Wild with Bear Grylls” that aired last night. Lunchbox brings the biggest bonehead story he’s had all year…he says this would make him “end it”. Mike D shares with us about how his Pokémon cards might be worth a lot of money…Bobby even offers to buy in half the investment!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
